tests.prompt: Host creates a lobby. Verify: encounterId and joinCode are returned, player appears in party list as host, stream connects.
Second player joins with join code. Verify: both players see each other in party list via stream events.
Player toggles ready. Verify: ready status updates for all players via stream event (not optimistically).
Host starts combat when all ready. Verify: CombatStarted event triggers transition to combat view.
Stream disconnects briefly. Verify: auto-reconnect happens, connection state shows 'reconnecting', then 'connected'.
Player leaves lobby. Verify: other players see them removed via stream event.
